name: Mud Hen Bars
author: Helen Menz and Donna Menz
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Cream oleo and sugar. Beat in the whole egg and 2 egg yolks. Sift flour, baking powder and salt together. Com- bine the 2 mixtures, blend thoroughly. Spread into a 9 x 13 inch pan. Sprinkle nuts, chocolate chips and marshmallows over batter. Beat 2 egg whites stiff, fold in brown sugar. Spread over top of cake. Bake 30 to 40 minutes. Cut into bars.
